alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 30 at 1:08AM EDT until further notice by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Saddle River near Lodi. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 6.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:45 AM EDT Saturday was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage around 8 am. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.9 feet on 04/04/1987. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Saddle River Lodi 5.5 6.8 Sat 12 am ED 3.2 2.7 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 900 AM EDT.
